column3: NEW: Grayscale CEO says approving their #Bitcoin ETF “would unlock billions” of unrealized shareholder value  🚀
Bloomberg senior analyst: #Bitcoin could soon kickstart the greatest bull market in history 🚀

While Putin reaps a whirlwind, ordinary Russians look to #bitcoin to try to weather the storm.  “Russians understand the black market... everybody here understands how to get around rules that they don’t like... so where do people look? To Bitcoin.”   https://t.co/mP1KWXojT6
